actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands and waters in Coles County, Illinois, for the purpose of establishing the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Lincoln Homestead National Recreation Area.
